forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Codename Superfast

comments.text: Hi all! Today's v151.4 (you're on [version]) brings the following new commands. Hope you enjoy!
"When touched then set run speed 20", ".. set jump speed 30.5", ".. set speed slidiness 10"
These numbers determine the desktop mode (WASD) movement. For instance, when you set the run speed to 90, a desktopper pressing Shift+W in your area races forward super fast!
Upon next area transport (or when using e.g. "set run speed default") the values will reset. Note a placement is required for these commands.
And update 151.5: There sometimes was a rhythmic haptic feedback buzz during launching Anyland, that's now avoided!

thread.latestCommentText: And update 151.5: There sometimes was a rhythmic haptic feedback buzz during launching Anyland, that's now avoided!
